inputWrapper.base: width: 80%; margin: 0 auto; border-color: grey; box-shadow: none; border-width: 0 0 1px 0; border-radius: 0px;
inputWrapper.errored: box-shadow: none; border-width: 0 0 1px 0; border-bottom: 1px solid maroon;
inputWrapper.focused: border-color: unset; box-shadow: unset; outline: none; outline-offset: 0px; border-bottom: 1px solid blue;

errorText.base: display: none; font-size: 14px; color: maroon; position: absolute; margin-top: 60px; margin-left: 50px; font-family: Roboto, Open Sans, Segoe UI, sans-serif;
